dcterms:creator: Adam Santoro
David Raposo
David G Barrett
Mateusz Malinowski
Razvan Pascanu
Peter Battaglia
Tim Lillicrap
dcterms:description: A single-object, grayscale version of Sort-of-CLEVR, consisting of 9 × 9 squares placed on a 64 × 64 canvas. The dataset contains three fields for each example: center location in Cartesian coordinates, a one-hot representation of its center pixel, and the resulting image of the square painted on the canvas.
dcterms:title: Not-so-Clevr

dcterms:creator: Adam Santoro
David Raposo
David G Barrett
Mateusz Malinowski
Razvan Pascanu
Peter Battaglia
Tim Lillicrap
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of two-object images, used for studies regarding relations and visual question answering. It is a simpler version of the Clevr dataset.
dcterms:title: Sort-of-Clevr

dcterms:creator: Justin Johnson
Bharath Hariharan
Laurens van der Maaten
Li Fei-Fei
C Lawrence Zitnick
Ross Girshick
dcterms:description: A diagnostic dataset for compositional language and elementary visual reasoning, consisting of rendered 3D shapes.
dcterms:title: Clevr

dcterms:creator: Fisher Yu
Ari Seff
Yinda Zhang
Shuran Song
Thomas Funkhouser
Jianxiong Xiao
dcterms:description: A large-scale image dataset constructed using deep learning with human involvement, aimed at scene understanding.
dcterms:title: LSUN (Large-scale Scene Understanding)
